member.name: M:HrAPI.Controllers.TestController.GetEmployees
member.summary: Retrieves all employees with their related data
member.returns: A list of all employees including absence requests and feedback

member.name: M:HrAPI.Controllers.TestController.GetEmployee(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific employee by ID
member.response: If the employee is not found

member.name: M:HrAPI.Controllers.TestController.GetAbsenceRequests
member.summary: Retrieves all absence requests with related employee data
member.returns: A list of all absence requests
member.response: Returns the list of absence requests

member.name: M:HrAPI.Controllers.TestController.GetFeedbacks
member.summary: Retrieves all feedback records with related employee data
member.returns: A list of all feedback records
member.response: Returns the list of feedback records
